item.title: STILL NEED HELP!: muting a player?
item.dc:creator: @Zenzie Zenzie
item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

add

[code]public void appendToMuted (String player) {

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/muted.txt", true));
 bw.write(player);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
 } catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error mute user!");
 }
  }

} [/code]

under public void appendToBanned

use this command

[code]if(command.startsWith(“mute”)) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is muted "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully muted”);
appendToMuted(victim);

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/muted.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" muted"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
}
  }

}[/code]

[size=15pt]MAKE SURE YOU ADDED THE REST ON PREV PAGE![/size]

Read full topic

item.description:
@Zenzie wrote:

So it works only on wrong person lemmie fix

[code]if(command.startsWith(“mute”)) {
String victim = command.substring(6);
PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
System.out.println(“Admin:”+playerName+" is muted "+victim);
sendMessage(“Player “+victim+” successfully muted”);
“+victim+” muted = 1;

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

  try {
     bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/muted.txt", true));
bw.write(playerName+" muted"+victim);
bw.newLine();
bw.flush();
  } catch (IOException ioe) {
ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
if (bw != null) try {
    bw.close();
} catch (IOException ioe2) {
    sendMessage("Error logging warning!");
}
  }

}[/code]

  BufferedWriter bw = null;

 bw.write(playerName+" muted"+victim);
 bw.newLine();
 bw.flush();

 ioe.printStackTrace();
  } finally {
 if (bw != null) try {
